claim: Flublok is produced using a novel production platform in which recombinant HA is expressed in insect cells using a baculovirus expression vector system (BEVS).

combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote identifies RIV4 as a recombinant HA vaccine, which directly supports the claim that Flublok is produced using a recombinant technology platform.

combined_evidence.quote: HA = hemagglutinin; IIV4 = inactivated influenza vaccine, quadrivalent; ... RIV4 (recombinant HA vaccine)
combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote defines RIV4 as a recombinant hemagglutinin vaccine, supporting the claim that Flublok is produced by expressing recombinant HA, which is a key part of the novel production platform described.
